content: A perfect choice for the modern maverick traveler. Our cozy residential accommodations offer true respite from a supercharged day of exploring our vibrant neighborhoods. The sleek minimalist décor of the room features unique and custom-designed furnishings. Our elevated vantage point atop Nob Hill provides exterior rooms with spectacular views. All of our rooms are equipped with high-speed, reliable WiFi along with several more standout amenities.
